117314.「…………。\n ここから北……ザマ峠。\n そこに ザマ烽火台……ある。\n<:
North of here is Zama Pass. North of here is Zama Pass. There is the Zama Beacon. Landonfoot, north of Zama Pass. Go west from
there and you will find Gert Strait Bridge Inn. Southeast of here is Gilzad Region. There is Cove Village there. If you haven't been
there yet, you should go there.

112690.墓石には 「踊り子ファラン ここに眠る」\nと刻まれている。:
The tomb stone is inscribed ''dancerFaran here
lies''.

112692.かなり古い墓石だ。\n名前が刻まれていたようだが\nかすれていて 読み取ることが:

had a name engraved on it, but it is too faint
to read.
